Package com.palomamobile.android.sdk.verification.email

At a high level the Verification SDK supports email verification functionality.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IEmailVerificationManager
    Methods in this interface provide convenient job creation methods that provide easy access to the underlying IEmailVerificationService functionality.
    IEmailVerificationService
    This interface is consumed by the Retrofit library to provide access to the Paloma Mobile Platform Verification Service RESTful API.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EventEmailVerificationCreated
    Event published on the IEventBus (as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus()) whenever a new email address verification is request is completed.
    EventEmailVerificationUpdated
    Event published on the IEventBus (as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus()) whenever email address verification update request is completed.
    JobCreateEmailVerification
    Convenience wrapper around IEmailVerificationService.postEmailVerification(String, String, String) used to create a new verification of an email address.
    JobPostEmailVerificationUpdate
    Convenience wrapper around IEmailVerificationService.updateEmailVerification(String, String, VerificationEmailUpdate) used to finalize an existing verification of an email address with a verification code (received on the email address being verified).
    JobPostUserVerifiedEmail
    Convenience wrapper around IEmailVerificationService.updateUserEmail(String, long, UserVerifiedEmailUpdate) used to finalize an existing verification of an email address with a verification code (received on the email address being verified) and assign the verified email to a user.
    UserVerifiedEmailUpdate
    Info required to preform an update of the email address of an existing user.
    VerificationEmailUpdate
    Contains parameters for update of a verification email.

Package com.palomamobile.android.sdk.verification.email Description

At a high level the Verification SDK supports email verification functionality.
  • Verification of an email address
  • Updating user with verified email address
